title: Theatre in the United States
description: Examination of American plays, playwrights, organizations and movements, applying them as portraits of the United States' historical, philosophical and cultural make-up. Topical emphasis focuses on the definition and development of an 'American' identity via the context of theatre. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE C4 except for Theatre majors.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Areas A and C3 (TH 210 recommended); TH 210, TH 227, or TH 228 for Theatre majors
